title: Harnessing Self assembly to generate a spectrum of multi-functionalised nanoparticles for multimodal imaging
abstractText: We will use a protein that can self assemble from its subunits into a capsule as a vehicle for imaging inside patients using magnetic resonance or tomography and in the longer term delivering drugs to specific tissues such as tumours. As the individual building blocks of the protein capsule can be modified in different ways, the capsule can be optimised on an individual basis based on patient need.
